name: Harry Potter Wiki
description: An Express in conjunction with EJS web application. Purpose: To allow users to use full CRUD abilities to view and edit a Harry Potter wiki page
summary: Built fully functional and styled CRUD application, storing and accessing information on MongoDB with Mongoose
Implemented the Bootstrap Framework to supplement CSS, increasing responsiveness to mobile platform
Experienced the importance of abstraction when having to go back an refactor hardcoded areas and debugging

name: Personal Library
description: JQuery Application incorporating APIs and LocalStorage. Purpose: To allow user to search and save book details to a personal library with shelves
summary: Incorporated AJax to become familiar with the basis of making a request to allow a better understanding of the modern Fetch API
Implemented jQuery to manipulate DOM understanding how to integrate legacy code into modern libraries and frameworks

name: Weather Lookup
description: jQuery Application with API Calls, Purpose: To allow users to check the current weather in their area an on larger screens have the ability to see a five day forecast
summary: Implemented mobile responsiveness with the Grid system in conjunction with Flexbox
Utilizes Promise method to query weather api and parse JSON

name: Pet Simulator
description: Real-Time Browser Application. Purpose: To allow user to take care of pet whose needs change over time
summary: Built the foundation of a responsive web game with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure a functional and usable user experience
Implemented asynchronous function setInterval which provided insights into the concept of threads
